preparation: Squeeze as much liquid as possible from spinach and roughly chop.
Beat eggs with milk until light and fluffy. Fold in remaining ingredients.
Pour into a lightly greased 9" pie plate or square baking dish. Bake for 35â€“45 minutes, or until knife inserted in middle comes out clean.
Allow to cool and set for about 8 minutes. Slice and serve.
tips: Dish up with a dollop of prepared Epicure Dillicious Tzatziki and a salad.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix

With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.
